verses.text: \w Deliver|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w mine|strong="H7971"\w* enemies, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*: \w Set|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H5329"\w* high \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* rise \w up|strong="H7971"\w* \w against|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6965"\w* iniquity, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* bloodthirsty men.

For, lo, they lie \w in|strong="H1818"\w* wait for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* soul; \w The|strong="H3467"\w* mighty gather themselves together against \w me|strong="H3467"\w*: \w Not|strong="H3467"\w* for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* transgression, nor for \w my|strong="H5337"\w* sin, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* run \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prepare \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \add my\add* fault: Awake \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* help \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*.

Even \w thou|strong="H7200"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* Israel, \w Arise|strong="H5782"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w visit|strong="H7125"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations: \w Be|strong="H5771"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H7200"\w* wicked transgressors. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* return \w at|strong="H3478"\w* evening, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* howl \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dog, \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H1471"\w* \w about|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city.

Behold, \w they|strong="H5892"\w* belch \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* mouth; Swords \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* lips: \w For|strong="H5892"\w* who, \add say they\add*, doth hear?

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, wilt laugh at \w them|strong="H8085"\w*; \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* wilt \w have|strong="H8193"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations \w in|strong="H8085"\w* derision.

\add Because of\add* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give heed \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thee; \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1471"\w* tower.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* God \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* lovingkindness \w will|strong="H5797"\w* meet \w me|strong="H8104"\w*: God \w will|strong="H5797"\w* let \w me|strong="H8104"\w* see \add my desire\add* upon \w mine|strong="H8104"\w* enemies.

Slay \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w*, lest \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* forget: Scatter \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* power, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w bring|strong="H6923"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* down, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* shield.

\add For\add* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* sin \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* mouth, \add and\add* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* words \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* lips, \w Let|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* even \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H2026"\w* pride, \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H2428"\w* cursing \w and|strong="H5971"\w* lying \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* speak.

Consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* wrath, consume \w them|strong="H1697"\w*, \w so|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3920"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H6310"\w* more: \w And|strong="H1697"\w* let \w them|strong="H1697"\w* know \w that|strong="H1697"\w* God ruleth \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, \w Unto|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* earth. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w at|strong="H3045"\w* evening let \w them|strong="H3615"\w* return, let \w them|strong="H3615"\w* howl \w like|strong="H2534"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dog, \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w go|strong="H2534"\w* round \w about|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* city.

\w They|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* wander \w up|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* food, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* tarry \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w night|strong="H6153"\w* if \w they|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* satisfied.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w thy|strong="H7646"\w* strength; Yea, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* sing aloud \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w thy|strong="H7646"\w* lovingkindness \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* morning: \w For|strong="H3808"\w* thou hast \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* high tower, \w And|strong="H7646"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* day \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* distress.

\w Unto|strong="H2617"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* praises: \w For|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* high \w tower|strong="H4869"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.
